content.detailedDescription: Dear sirs weve been observing,strange objects an lights that look like portals,at iron mountian mine east of redding,10 t0 20 government vehicles an hour entering this sight, they claim its a toxic clean up sight,but we think its a under ground base for the navy and air force,and alien craft,the gate has been moved about 8 miles from where it was,you could see a long white bulding from the old gate,with all kinds of weard antinas on top,and a sign on the main gate  that read no radios allowed in the area,and leathel force will be authorized  just like area 51,,,
content.summary: A big triangle lit on each tip moved tword us after i flashed my  car head lights at it

content.detailedDescription: It was around 6:20 am while walking my little dog bingo i looked up and saw this beautiful blue orb that was rather large.  first i thought it was the blue sky appearing before sunrise but the clouds were real gray and overcast.  the orb seem to be in front of them.  i was transfixed with the sighting.  i looked down at my dog and back up and it was gone.  i viewed it for a good 4-5 minutes.  when i saw it i was excited thinking this is a sighting and at the same time i'm thinking what is this.  it was really beautiful and i first thought is this some weird northern light.
content.summary: A large blue orb over the gray clouds right before the beginning of sunrise

content.detailedDescription:
I was eating lunch outside with my co-workers.  i was facing the low hills i believe s/w.  suddenly this light gray huge object came racing by low on the horizon.  i stood up pointing yelling "look at that , look at that" my co-workers looked at me then turned and it was gone. they did not see it. 

it was so large and emitting cloud-like mist, changing shape- but the entire sky was blue.  i had the distinct impression that it was trying to "cloak' or hide.  it must have been very low on the horizon because i could not see it after it went behind the hills.  shortly after it went behind the hills a slow two seater plane flew perpendicular to the flight path over-head. 

 i have no idea what it was. i searched news and checked "ufo' reports but nothing came up..


i did not feel anything but i can't stop wondering about it and thought there'd be no harm in reporting it.  hopefully someone else saw it too.
content.summary: Very,very fast, large morphing shape-reflective but sometimes covered in cloud .

content.detailedDescription: I was outside talking to my girlfriend on the phone looking at the flashes of lighting in the distance to the west towards birmingham, then all of a sudden i saw the big bright objects that were coming in my direction but moving slowly. i observed them for a min to see if they were planes but i didn't hear anything. a few seconds later they started to form in a formation. one moved up then another one moved beside that one and the other ones were stationary. when i saw the movement i knew that they couldn't be planes or helicopters. i told my girl that i think i'm looking at a ufo. i always see objects that aren't planes in the sky at night anyway but never that close or low. i ran to get my mom bc i was at her house and she woke up to come see what i was talking about and she was like idk what those are. that's when they started to dim out one by one very slowly. i waited outside for like 20 mins afterwards to see if i could hear anything pass over me but never heard a thing. i never experienced something like that in my life. like i said i always see the lights in the sky that look like stars but not that low or close.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I was outside looking at the lighting after a storm and i saw these 5 bright objects over the tree line in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: My wife daughter son and i were waiting at hardees drive through window when  i looked out and over to the left of and over walmart and saw a hudge   sphere hovering above the treeline in the distance the sun was to the west suddenly another identical object came down from the sky and bumped into the left side of the first blue yellow and orange sparks fell to the ground from between them it seemed to me it was as though the second was      jumping the first one off then they both shot up in an instant they were gone
content.summary: Gold or bronze color
